item.title: Monthly Berlin SailfishOS/Jolla meeting at c-base (every 1st Monday) - together.jolla.com
item.description:
Monthly Berlin SailfishOS/Jolla meeting at c-base (every 1st Monday) - together.jolla.com

The meeting takes place on a regular base every 1st Monday per month starting 19:00! NEXT MEETING IS ON 14.03 at cbase ...

item.title: Bitcoin's nightmare scenario has come to pass
item.description:
Bitcoin's nightmare scenario has come to pass

Over the last year and a half a number of prominent voices in the Bitcoin community have been warning that the system needed to make fundamental changes to its core software code to avoid being overwhelmed by the continued growth of Bitcoin transactions.
